attributes.action: STOP USING THE TAXPAYERS MONEY TO BAIL OUT FAILED FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We pay our taxes in this country to help our fellow people in times of hardship, to protect us against criminals and terrorists, to build infrastructure and maintain it. We do not wish for our hard earned money to be spent on financial institutions that have lead our country into massive debt and poor financial stability.
